welcome_message_body: Welcome to Ankara, the vibrant capital of Turkey! Get ready to immerse yourself in its rich history, unique culture, and stunning architecture as you explore all that this charming city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

restaurants.name: Babaannenin Sofrası
restaurants.description: Babaannenin Sofrası is a turkish restaurant located in Çankaya/Öveçler.

restaurants.name: 90's Doksanlar Mangal (Köfte-Tantuni-Döner)
restaurants.description: 90's Doksanlar Mangal (Köfte-Tantuni-Döner) is a kofte place located in Çankaya.
restaurants.address: Kabil Caddesi Eski 4. Cadde No: 22/C, 06460 Çankaya

restaurants.name: Cansu piknik
restaurants.description: Cansu piknik is a breakfast spot located in Ankara.
restaurants.address: Çetin Emeç Bulvari (1314. Cd. (8. Cd.) no:43 övecler), Ankara

restaurants.name: Eda Et Lokantası
restaurants.description: Eda Et Lokantası is a turkish restaurant located in Ankara.

restaurants.name: Çavuşoğulları Pide Kebap
restaurants.description: Çavuşoğulları Pide Kebap is a turkish restaurant located in Ankara.
restaurants.address: Abidinpaşa Tıp Fakültesi Cad. No:172/B Mamak, Ankara

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.
